name: eldercare-admin.toml

role.name: Administrator
role.description: Company administrators managing orders and specialists

rawContent:
# Admin Role
# Company administrators

[role]
id = "eldercare-admin"
name = "Administrator"
description = "Company administrators managing orders and specialists"
level = 3

[role.identification]
method = "phone"
required = true
verification = "sms-otp"

[permissions]
list = [
  "order:read:all",
  "order:assign",
  "order:update",
  "specialist:create",
  "specialist:read:all",
  "specialist:update",
  "specialist:activate",
  "specialist:deactivate",
  "availability:read:all",
  "dashboard:view"
]

[role.actions]
canDo = [
  "View all orders",
  "Assign specialists to orders",
  "Create and manage specialists",
  "Activate/deactivate specialists",
  "Define specialist service areas",
  "View dashboard metrics",
  "View specialist availability"
]
cannotDo = [
  "Delete orders permanently",
  "Access financial/accounting",
  "Modify system settings"
]

[relations]
guards = ["authenticated", "admin-only"]
routes = ["admin-dashboard", "admin-orders", "admin-specialists", "specialist-detail", "order-assignment"]
platforms = ["admin-app"]
